resources.string: Elowen steps into the tavern, an embodiment of scholarly grace, a quill and parchment in hand, her eyes sparkling with the wisdom of ages and an insatiable thirst for knowledge.

string-array.name: player_elowen
string-array.item: A drink to complement your scholarly adventures today. May it offer flavors as diverse as your research.
Careful, that drink might have a surprise flavor hidden within.
A chef seeking a drink to pair with culinary delights. Perhaps I could bring a different kind of flavor to your evening?
